markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Astral](/Traits.aspx?ID=14)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Astral creatures are native of the [Astral Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=8). They can survive the basic environmental effects of the Astral Plane.
name: Astral
